name: AR Angry Zombies
description:
Augmented Reality Tower Defense!
Survive the apocalypse of Angry Zombies in the real world with AR!

Shoot, throw grenades, improve your wall and weapon, and call your buddies to help you remain alive towards tons of angry zombies coming after you!

◉ Try to survive as many waves of angry zombies as you can
◉ Play 3 different game modes
◉ Complete all 54 Levels
◉ Complete 100 missions
◉ Receive Daily Rewards
◉ Compare your highscore with players worldwide

iPhone X fully suported!

This game requires iOS 11, iPhone 6s or newer and camera access.
